forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. West wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As night descends over Downtown San Francisco, the city wears a cloak of clouds, punctuated by the cool caress of a westward breeze. The air feels fresh, the kind that whispers promises of coming warmth, yet wrapped in layers of mystery. The chill, dipping to around 52 degrees, invites you to slip into something cozy—perhaps a soft sweater accompanied by a light jacket to ward off the wind that sings through the streets at 20 mph. 

Tomorrow promises a change, as the sun prepares to unveil itself, bringing a near-summery embrace with highs around 68. The skies will clear, yet the lingering influences of the marine layer may cast a fleeting veil in the early morning. A brisk wind, mellowing to a gentle breeze, will accompany those seeking the solace of the outdoors. Ideal for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to one of the city's art-strewn parks, tomorrow's sunshine beckons you to savor the day. With a bit of luck, perhaps a meal outdoors will merge culinary delights with the vibrant atmosphere of the city, where the fog dances back to sea, leaving behind clearer views and a sense of renewal.
